title: Hello Puerto Rico!
description:
The gang’s in Puerto Rico as Randall prepares to resume production on his movie!  Lala, Randall, and producers Tim and Alex talk coronavirus, cooking, astrological signs, romantic gestures, and they speculate on who’s going to pony up a thousand dollars for a 10-second shoutout from Floyd Mayweather!

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
